thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 11 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Eagle Materials Says Group Of Homebuilder Plaintiffs Entered Agreement To Settle All Claims Made Against Unit By Plaintiffs

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eagle Materials Says Group Of Homebuilder Plaintiffs Entered Agreement To Settle All Claims Made Against Unit By Plaintiffs

organizations.name: settle all claims made against unit by plaintiffs
brief-eagle materials says group of homebuilder plaintiffs

text:
May 11 (Reuters) - Eagle Materials Inc:
* EAGLE MATERIALS - EFFECTIVE MAY 8 UNIT, GROUP OF HOMEBUILDER PLAINTIFFS ENTERED AGREEMENT TO SETTLE ALL CLAIMS MADE AGAINST UNIT BY PLAINTIFFS
* EAGLE MATERIALS INC - UNDER HOMEBUILDER SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT, CO’S UNIT AGREED TO PAY A TOTAL OF $6.0 MILLION IN CASH TO SETTLE CLAIMS
* EAGLE MATERIALS INC - COMPANY WILL RECORD SETTLEMENT AMOUNT AS AN EXPENSE IN ITS FISCAL Q4 2018 RESULTS Source text: ( bit.ly/2jRoM5T ) Further company coverage:
